hero.label: Hero
hero.desc: The protagonist who undergoes transformation through trials

mentor.label: Mentor
mentor.desc: Guides and teaches the hero, often with wisdom

shadow.label: Shadow
shadow.desc: The dark reflection of the hero, embodies rejected aspects

herald.label: Herald
herald.desc: Announces the call to adventure, brings change

trickster.label: Trickster
trickster.desc: Provides comic relief, questions status quo

threshold_guardian.label: Threshold Guardian
threshold_guardian.desc: Tests the hero before major transitions

ally.label: Ally
ally.desc: Supports the hero, provides skills or companionship

mother.label: Mother Figure
mother.desc: Nurturing, protective, represents home and safety

father.label: Father Figure
father.desc: Authority, rules, represents order or tyranny
